description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide] and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] from all of your current foes, or use Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] to all your current foes.

When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible] for 1 minute, even if you use a hostile action. Not even @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Glitterdust], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.See Invisibility], or similar effects can reveal you, though creatures can still use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] action to locate you as normal.
